reviews.name: Steve Jobs
reviews.text: When you innovate, you make mistakes. It is best to admit them quickly, and get on with improving your other innovations.

reviews.name: John Jones
reviews.text: Design everything on the assumption that people are not heartless or stupid but marvelously capable, given the chance.

reviews.name: Bill Gates
reviews.text: Technology is just a tool. In terms of getting the kids working together and motivating them, the teacher is the most important.
